revised_title: Influence of Solvent on Absorption Spectra of Dissolved Dyes
tldr: The author investigates the influence of solvents on the absorption spectra of dissolved dyes, specifically isocyanine dyes, and discovers that the absorption spectra differ significantly between water and organic solvents. The study also examines the effect of alkali on the dyes' absorption spectra and the role of aggregation in their behavior.
